main event: On September 20, 1967, two boys in Tipp City, Ohio observed a light in the sky which they described as appearing larger and brighter than a star, consisting of red and white lights.
interesting points: The object was seen for about 10-15 minutes and appeared to hover before moving south,Another local resident also reported seeing unusual lights in the sky during the same time frame,The sighting was initially reported to the City Police, then to the Air Police agency,The object was described as having no distinct features, only lights,The boys expressed a desire to know more about what they saw, indicating that others in the area were afraid to report unusual sightings.
sighted object: a bright light with red and white colors
witness description: Two boys, ages approximately 17, who were riding motorcycles when they observed the object.
